label: social_support
src_text: Congratulations and thanks for sharing your story and giving me hope that our relationship can work.
augmented_text: "It takes guts to share your story with the world, and I admire your bravery more than words can express. Thank you for being such a positive influence in my life."

label: social_support
src_text: Haha, glad you enjoyed my predicament.
augmented_text: "Omg, I can't believe what happened! But I'm so proud of you for handling it with grace. You got this! 💪"

label: social_support
src_text: I'm also glad that we have you in our community.
augmented_text: "Your encouragement means everything to me as I pursue my dreams. Thanks for believing in me!"

label: social_support
src_text: Thank you for this incredible advice and putting some shit in my life into perspective.
augmented_text: "Thank you for sharing your story with me. It really helped put things into perspective and made me feel less alone."

label: social_support
src_text: I write responses for my benefit, teaching something always makes you go over your thought process in depth.
augmented_text: "It's great to see you pursuing your passion, keep chasing your dreams! 🎉" #motivation

label: social_support
src_text: Thank you for being inquisitive and frank and I'm glad we are having this conversation.
augmented_text: "I know things have been tough lately, but I want you to know that I'm always here to listen and offer any help I can."

label: social_support
src_text: America would gladly help secure your borders because we're friends.
augmented_text: "To my lovely friend going through a tough time, I'm here for you! Whether it's just a listening ear or help with errands, count on me. ❤️"

label: social_support
src_text: Thank you for being inquisitive and frank and I'm glad we are having this conversation.
augmented_text: "I'm sorry to hear you're going through a rough patch. Remember that I'm just a message away if you ever need someone to talk to or a shoulder to cry on."

label: social_support
src_text: Congratulations and thanks for sharing your story and giving me hope that our relationship can work.
augmented_text: "Congrats on taking this huge step towards healing and growth! You got this, and I'm always here to support you!"

label: social_support
src_text: Thank you for your concern but my mother's godmother is a lesbian, and extremely close to my grandmother.
augmented_text: "I know it's not easy being away from home for college, especially during holidays. If you ever need a home-cooked meal or just someone to hang out with, hit me up! 🍴👨‍🎓"

label: social_support
src_text: He was never top class but if you make it a decade anywhere I suppose you deserve it.
augmented_text: "Wow, 10 years? That's mind blowing! Congratulations on achieving something truly remarkable. Can't wait to see what the future holds for you."

label: social_support
src_text: I wish you could have a word with my wife.
augmented_text: "I'm here for you, girl! If you need someone to talk to or just want me to listen, I'm all ears! 💕"

label: social_support
src_text: Too bad about the stigma and illegality of what we do, cause i feels you.
augmented_text: "Sending you all my positive vibes and strength during this difficult time. You're not alone! 💪❤️"

label: social_support
src_text: I wish you could have a word with my wife.
augmented_text: "I'm so sorry to hear about what you're going through. Can I bring over some dinner or help out with errands? Let me know how I can assist. 🍴🛍️"

label: social_support
src_text: While my questions were rhetorical thank you for the detailed answers.
augmented_text: "I don't know what I would do without friends like you who take the time to offer words of comfort and guidance."
